project.title: Email Newsletter
project.description: A reliable and efficient email newsletter delivery service with a strong focus on security, scalability, and correctness. Developed using Rust, PostgreSQL, Redis, and Docker, and deployed on DigitalOcean, the system processes emails asynchronously through background workers pulling tasks from a PostgreSQL queue.

project.title: Portfolio
project.description: This site you're on right now! It's a platform where I can showcase my skills, projects, and technical blog.

project.title: Promise Implementation
project.description: An implementation of the JavaScript Promise API that closely mimics native promise behavior

project.title: Finite State Machine Implementation
project.description: An Implementation of a Finite State Machine (FSM) in TypeScript
